pages.title: Trees
pages.text: - Trees grow progressively from seeds to mature trees over time, growing around obstacles in a natural way.$(br2)- Trees have growth rate and mature sizes that are biome, temperature and rainfall dependent.$(br2)- Thin branches can be climbed like ladders.

- Their growth can be sped up with the use of bone meal, which also replenishes the $(l:mechanics/rooty_soil)soil's fertility$().$(br2)- Trees drop seeds at random that can potentially plant themselves.$(br2)- Trees won't grow in darkness. Leaves not connected to an outer tree branch or starved of light will die. Outer branches without leaves slowly rot away.

- Walking on leaves blocks is slow and you sink slightly on them. Falling onto leaves prevents fall damage but destroys the leaf blocks.$(br2)- There are unique new species for fruits, such as $(l:trees/apple_tree)apple trees$().$(br2)- Falling trees can do a lot of damage if they hit something, so be careful!
A falling tree killing a pig
